verses.verse: And the <WG2532> Pharisees <WG5330> and <WG2532> Sadducees <WG4523> came <WG4334>, and trying <WG3985> him asked <WG1905> him <WG846> to show <WG1925> them <WG846> a sign <WG4592> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772>.

And Jesus <WG2424> perceiving <WG1097> it said <WG2036>, O ye of little faith <WG3640>, why <WG5101> reason ye <WG1260> among <WG1722> yourselves <WG1438>, because <WG3754> ye <WG1260> have <WG2983> no <WG3756> bread <WG740>?

Do ye <WG3539> not yet <WG3768> perceive <WG3539>, neither <WG3761> remember <WG3421> the <WG740> five <WG4002> loaves <WG740> of the five thousand <WG4000>, and <WG2532> how many <WG4214> baskets <WG2894> ye took up <WG2983>?

Now when <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> came <WG2064> into <WG1519> the parts <WG3313> of Caesarea <WG2542> Philippi <WG5376>, he asked <WG2065> his <WG846> disciples <WG3101>, saying <WG3004>, Who <WG5101> do <WG3004> men <WG444> say that <WG3004> the <WG3165> Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> is <WG3165>?

And <WG1161> Simon <WG4613> Peter <WG4074> answered <WG611> and said <WG2036>, Thou <WG4771> art <WG1488> the Christ <WG5547>, the Son <WG5207> of the <WG2316> living <WG2198> God <WG2316>.

But <WG1161> he turned <WG4762>, and said <WG2036> unto Peter <WG4074>, Get thee <WG5217> behind <WG3694> me <WG3450>, Satan <WG4567>: thou art <WG1488> a stumbling-block <WG4625> unto me <WG3450>: for <WG3754> thou mindest <WG5426> not <WG3756> the things of <WG3588> God <WG2316>, but <WG235> the things <WG3588> of men <WG444>.

Then <WG5119> said <WG2036> Jesus <WG2424> unto <WG3101> his <WG846> disciples <WG3101>, If <WG1487> any <WG5100> man would <WG2309> come <WG2064> after <WG3694> me <WG3450>, let him deny <WG533> himself <WG1438>, and <WG2532> take up <WG142> his <WG846> cross <WG4716>, and <WG2532> follow <WG190> me <WG3427>.

For <WG1063> whosoever <WG3739> would <WG2309> save <WG4982> his <WG846> life <WG5590> shall lose <WG622> it <WG846>: and <WG1161> whosoever <WG3739> shall lose <WG622> his <WG846> life <WG5590> for <WG1752> my <WG1700> sake <WG1752> shall find <WG2147> it <WG846>.

For <WG1063> what <WG5101> shall <WG5623> a man <WG444> be profited <WG5623>, if <WG1437> he shall gain <WG2770> the <WG2889> whole <WG3650> world <WG2889>, and <WG1161> forfeit <WG2210> his <WG846> life <WG5590>? or <WG2228> what <WG5101> shall <WG1325> a man <WG444> give <WG1325> in exchange <WG465> for <WG5590> his <WG846> life <WG5590>?
